text: The Guatemalan ambassador to the Italian Government in Rome is the official representative of the Government in Guatemala City to the Government of Italy. == List of Representatives == {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic accreditation !| ambassador !| Observations !| President of Guatemala !| List of Prime Ministers of Italy !| Term end |- | |Tomás Legarini |In 1880 Tomás Legarini, a subject of Victor Emmanuel III of Italy established the legation of Guatemala in Rome.Tomás Legarini |Justo Rufino Barrios Auyón |Benedetto Cairoli | |- | |Martín Barrundia |In April 1885 they created the legation en Italia and he appointed Minister to Don Martín Barrundia.Martín Barrundia |Manuel Lisandro Barillas Bercián |Agostino Depretis | |- | |Crisanto Medina |Enviado extraordinario y Minister Plenipotenciario de la República de Guatemala en ParísCrisanto Medina |Manuel Lisandro Barillas Bercián |Francesco Crispi | |- | |Adrián Recinos |Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary of Guatemala accredited to the governments of France, Italy, Holland, Belgium and Spain. title: List of ambassadors of Guatemala to Italy
